I can guide you through providing college informatons, Departments in college, Number of intakes in each department

The Institute of Technology and Management (ITM, GIDA, Gorakhpur) established in July 2001 under the patronage of Shree Krishna Educational Society run by a group of socially oriented professionals and entrepreneurs. The Institute is located on the Gorakhpur-Lucknow National Highways at a distance of about 12 kms from Gorakhpur city which is well connected by road and rail and limited airways with all major cities of India .

patterns: What are the courses offered by the collge
I want to know the courses available in the college
responses: Initially, B.Tech in four branches namely ECE ,CSE, IT, & ME and MCA courses were started. Later on, the Institute extended its scope of teaching by opening Bachelor of Pharmacy, Master of Business Administration and B.TECH in Civil Engineering. Listing the courses -> 1. B. Tech(CSE&IT, ME, ECE, Civil)  2. MBA  3. BBA  4. B. Pharma   5. D. Pharma  6. BCA  7. Diploma

patterns: How can I contact to the collge?
responses: The address of the college is Sector 7, GIDA, Gorakhpur - 273209 and you can contact on +91-8081209500 or director@itmgkp.edu.in

patterns: How is the placement in the college
responses: Placements in 30+ companies in academic session 2019-20 More than 95% Students in Diploma & 90% students in B. Tech. course placed in academic session 2018-19, 100% placements in some of branches in Polytechnic & B. Tech. courses.

Placements in Wipro Ltd., Tata Consultancy Service (TCS), Expedien eSolutions, Recom Infotech Pvt. Ltd., Advik Digital Solutions, VK Soft Pvt. Ltd., Pie Infocom, Genpact, uCertify, Chreso Services Pvt. Ltd., Net2Source Inc., C-Core India Technosolution Pvt. Ltd.
